name: Speedy Sky Strike
description:
Created for Terry Cavanagh's "STOP WAITING FOR GODOT" Jam, this is an experiment with the 3d side of the engine, as I had never used it before

Controls:

  • Move mouse to aim/rotate ship
  • Left Click to fire
  • Right Click for turbo
  • Esc to pause

Try to beat a 20 sec time!

(HTML5 build is provided for convenience, but a desktop version is recommended for performance reasons.)

(Uses some assets by Kenney.)
